metadata.title: CVE-2018-10529 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in LibRaw 0.18.9. There is an out-of-bounds readaffecting the X3F property table list implementation in libraw_x3f.cpp andlibraw_cxx.cpp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10529` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.8-2ubuntu1
libraw23 - 0.18.8-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.18.8-2ubuntu1').
darktable package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
